attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of bailing out the banks with existing and future taxpayer's money, why not pay of off the equivalent amount of every outstanding mortgage? At present the billions have done nothing to save the economy by encouraging people to spend. This would surely release money across the economy and make amends for allowing the ridiculous increase in housing costs over the years.
